Reviews.Title: This phone was completely useless
Reviews.Author: TLW
Reviews.Content: It came completely dead with no home charger. A COMPLETE WASTE OF MONEY! I will never order a phone online again!

Reviews.Title: Another horrible Motorola phone
Reviews.Author: John Schroeder
Reviews.Content: This is the worst phone I've ever owned. It drops calls all the time, it takes 30 seconds to connect when trying to make a call. Combined with Verizon it makes me want to stop using cell phones entirely. I wonder how both of these companies stay in business.
